channel.title: 508 Christmas event (Each player gets a gift in their inventory)
channel.description: is there any way that starting on a certain date each player gets a present in their inventory. And then it ends on a certain date. I dont mind starting it manually and cancelling manually, but i just want each player to get an item in their inventory. thanks.

item.title: 508 Christmas event (Each player gets a gift in their inventory)
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:2, topic:423180”][quote author=TempahScape link=topic=525831.msg3828734#msg3828734 date=1322407510]
is there any way that starting on a certain date each player gets a present in their inventory. And then it ends on a certain date. I dont mind starting it manually and cancelling manually, but i just want each player to get an item in their inventory. thanks.
[/quote]
character files>character then go into the bank section and add it lol.[/quote]A lot of work… People will also get the items if they don’t log in for Christmas. Just add a boolean to the player class like ‘receivedHolidayGift’. Then after the server sends the welcome sendMessage to the client, add something like:

if (!receivedHolidayGift) {
    addItemToInventory(GIFT_ITEM_ID);
    receivedHolidayGift = true;
}

Remember to save the boolean to their save file, otherwise they’ll receive the gift every time they login.

Read full topic
item.source: 508 Christmas event (Each player gets a gift in their inventory)
